code: export const SearchMealByName=async name=>{const response=await fetch(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=${name}`);const data=await response.json();return data.meals;};export const FetchMealById=async id=>{const response=await fetch(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/lookup.php?i=${id}`);const data=await response.json();return data.meals[0];};export const FetchMealByFirstLetter=async function(){let letter=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'b';const response=await fetch(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?f=${letter}`);const data=await response.json();return data.meals;};
